{{Useful Function}}
<lowercasetitle/>


This function checks whether a vehicle is empty.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">bool isVehicleEmpty ( vehicle theVehicle )</syntaxhighlight>

* '''theVehicle''': The vehicle that you want to check.

==Code==
<section name="Serverside/Clientside Script" class="both" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function isVehicleEmpty( vehicle )
	if not isElement( vehicle ) or getElementType( vehicle ) ~= "vehicle" then
		return true
	end

	local passengers = getVehicleMaxPassengers( vehicle )
	if type( passengers ) == 'number' then
		for seat = 0, passengers do
			if getVehicleOccupant( vehicle, seat ) then
				return false
			end
		end
	end
	return true
end
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
